p: The increase in the incidence of dengue and the manifestation of epidemics devastating small and large urban centers, bring insecurity to the Brazilian population. In this context, Teixeira [ 40] emphasizes that the demand for medical care goes beyond the capacity of services. The quality of care for affected patients is lower than desired and there is distrust of the population in the leaders and managers of the health services, which makes it even more difficult to manage during periods of crisis, thus establishing a framework of fragility of the public health.
